00032 ZFit_class::~ZFit_class(void){
00033   std::cout << "[STATUS] DESTROY ZFitter" << std::endl;
00034   if(commonMC  !=NULL) delete commonMC;
00035   if(commonData!=NULL) delete commonData;
00036   if(reducedMC  !=NULL) delete reducedMC;
00037   if(reducedData!=NULL) delete reducedData;
00038 
00039   return;
00040 }

00042 
00043 ZFit_class::ZFit_class(TChain *data_chain_, 
00044                        TChain *signal_chain_,
00045                        TChain *bkg_chain_, 
00046                        TString invMass_VarName, double invMass_min, double invMass_max, double bin_width
00047                        ):
00048   _isDataUnbinned(false), _isDataSumW2(false),
00049   _isMCUnbinned(true),    _isMCSumW2(true),
00050   _isToyUnbinned(false),  _isToySumW2(false),
00051   
00052   _forceNewFit(false),
00053   _initFitMC(true),
00054   _updateOnly(false),
00055   _oddMC(false), _oddData(false),
00056 
00057   _fit_type(1),
00058   data_chain(data_chain_),
00059   signal_chain(signal_chain_),
00060   bkg_chain(bkg_chain_),
00061 
00062   invMass(invMass_VarName, "Mee", invMass_min, invMass_max,"GeV/c^{2}"),
00063   convBwCbPdf(invMass),
00064   cruijffPdf(invMass),
00065 
00066   weight("weight","weight", 1, 0,100),
00067 
00068   Vars(weight, invMass),
00069 
00070   plot_data(NULL),
00071   plot_MC(NULL),
00072   data(NULL),
00073   signal(NULL),
00074 
00075   cutter(),
00076   commonMC(NULL), commonData(NULL), reducedMC(NULL), reducedData(NULL)
00077 {
00078   energyVar_name = GetEnergyVarName(invMass_VarName);
00079   cutter.energyBranchName=energyVar_name;
00080 
00081   /*--------------- imposto il binning */
00082   //double bin_width=.5;
00083   int nBins = (int)((invMass.getMax()-invMass.getMin())/bin_width);
00084   invMass.setBins(10000);
00085   invMass.setBins(nBins,"plotRange");
00086   std::cout << "nBins = " << nBins << "\t" << invMass.getBins("plotRange") << std::endl;
00087 
00088   invMass.Print();
00089 
00090   SetPDF_model();
00091 
00092   setTDRStyle1();
00093   //  TGaxis::SetMaxDigits(3);
00094   //  gStyle->SetLegendFillColor(0);
00095   gStyle->SetLegendBorderSize(1);
00096   gStyle->SetOptTitle(0);
00097 
00098 
00099   return;
00100 }

00103 void ZFit_class::Import(TString commonCut, TString eleID_, std::set<TString>& branchList){
00104   signal_chain->Draw(">>list","runNumber>1","entrylist",10);
00105   TEntryList *l = (TEntryList*) gROOT->FindObject("list");
00106 
00107   commonCut+="-eleID_"+eleID_;
00108   TString mcCut, dataCut;
00109   if(l->GetN()>0){ // runDependent MC, treat it has data
00110     std::cout << "[INFO] Importing run dependent MC" << std::endl;
00111     if(_oddMC) mcCut = cutter.GetCut(commonCut+"-odd", false);
00112     else mcCut = cutter.GetCut(commonCut, false);
00113   } else {
00114     std::cout << "[INFO] Importing std MC" << std::endl;
00115     if(_oddMC) mcCut = cutter.GetCut(commonCut+"-odd", true);
00116     else mcCut = cutter.GetCut(commonCut, true);
00117   }
00118   delete l;
00119 
00120   if(_oddData) dataCut = cutter.GetCut(commonCut+"-odd", false);
00121   else dataCut = cutter.GetCut(commonCut, false);
00122   //std::cout << dataCut << std::endl;
00123   std::cout << "------------------------------ IMPORT DATASETS" << std::endl;
00124   std::cout << "--------------- Importing signal mc: " <<signal_chain->GetEntries() <<std::endl;
00125   //if(signal!=NULL) delete signal;
00126   
00127   signal = ImportTree(signal_chain, mcCut, branchList);
00128   commonMC = new TEntryList(*(signal->GetEntryList()));
00129   //signal->Print();
00130   //exit(0);
00131   std::cout << "--------------- Importing data: " << data_chain->GetEntries() << std::endl;
00132   //if(data!=NULL) delete data;
00133   data = ImportTree(data_chain, dataCut, branchList);
00134   commonData = new TEntryList(*(data->GetEntryList()));
00135   //commonData->Print();
00136   std::cout << "[INFO] imported " << commonData->GetN() << "\t" << (data->GetEntryList())->GetN() << " events passing commmon cuts" << std::endl;
00137   //data->Print();
00138   std::cout << "--------------- IMPORT finished" << std::endl;
00139   //  exit(0);
00140   return;
00141 }

00145 
00146 TChain *ZFit_class::ImportTree(TChain *chain, TString commonCut, std::set<TString>& branchList){
00147 
00148   if(branchList.size() > 0){
00149     std::cout << "[STATUS] Disabling branches to fast import" << std::endl;
00150     chain->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00151   }
00152 
00153   for(std::set<TString>::const_iterator itr = branchList.begin();
00154       itr != branchList.end();
00155       itr++){
00156     std::cout << "[STATUS] Enabling branch: " << *itr << std::endl;
00157     chain->SetBranchStatus(*itr, 1);
00158   }
00159   // abilitare la lista dei friend branch
00160   if(chain->GetBranch("scaleEle"))  chain->SetBranchStatus("scaleEle", 1);
00161   if(chain->GetBranch("smearEle")) chain->SetBranchStatus("smearEle", 1);
00162   if(chain->GetBranch("puWeight")) chain->SetBranchStatus("puWeight", 1);
00163   if(chain->GetBranch("r9Weight")) chain->SetBranchStatus("r9Weight", 1);
00164   if(chain->GetBranch("invMassSigma_SC_regrCorr_pho")) chain->SetBranchStatus("invMassSigma_SC_regrCorr_pho", 1);
00165   chain->SetBranchStatus("R9Ele",1);
00166   chain->SetBranchStatus("etaEle",1);
00167   chain->SetBranchStatus("recoFlagsEle", 1);
00168   chain->SetBranchStatus("eleID", 1);
00169   chain->SetBranchStatus("eventNumber", 1);
00170   chain->SetBranchStatus(invMass.GetName(), 1);
00171   chain->AddBranchToCache("*",kTRUE);
00172   
00173   //std::cout << commonCut << std::endl;
00174   TString evListName="evList_";
00175   evListName+=chain->GetTitle();
00176   chain->Draw(">>"+evListName,commonCut,"entrylist");
00177   TEntryList *elist = (TEntryList*)gDirectory->Get(evListName);
00178  
00179   std::cout << "[INFO] Selected events: " << chain->GetTitle() << "\t" <<  elist->GetN() << std::endl;
00180   chain->SetEntryList(elist);
00181   
00182   //delete elist; // do not delete
00183   //std::cout << "[INFO] Selected events: " <<  chain->GetEntryList()->GetN() << std::endl;
00184 
00185   return chain;
00186 }

00189 RooDataHist *ZFit_class::ImportHist(TH1F *hist){
00190 
00191   // specifico se il tutto viene fatto su binned o unbinned datasets
00192   //  _isBinned=true;
00193 
00194   RooDataHist *data_hist = new RooDataHist(invMass.GetName(), invMass.GetTitle(),
00195                                            RooArgSet(invMass), hist);
00196 
00197   return data_hist;
00198 }

00202 
00203 RooDataSet *ZFit_class::TreeToRooDataSet(TChain *chain, TEntryList *entryList){
00204   
00205 
00206   Float_t invMass_;
00207 
00208   Float_t weight_; weight_=1;
00209   Float_t r9weight_[2]={1,1}; //r9weight_[0]=1; r9weight_[1]=1;
00210   Float_t pileupWeight_=1;
00211 
00212   Float_t corrEle_[2]={1,1}; //corrEle_[0]=1; corrEle_[1]=1;
00213   Float_t smearEle_[2]={1,1}; //corrEle_[0]=1; corrEle_[1]=1;
00214 
00215   chain->SetBranchAddress(invMass.GetName(), &invMass_);
00216 
00217   if(chain->GetBranch("puWeight")!=NULL){
00218     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding pileup weight branch from friend" << std::endl;
00219     chain->SetBranchAddress("puWeight", &pileupWeight_);
00220   } 
00221 
00222   if(chain->GetBranch("scaleEle")!=NULL){
00223     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy correction branch from friend" << std::endl;
00224     chain->SetBranchAddress("scaleEle", corrEle_);
00225   }
00226 
00227   if(chain->GetBranch("smearEle")!=NULL && TString(chain->GetTitle())!="d"){
00228     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy smearing branch from friend" << std::endl;
00229     //chain->Scan("smearEle");
00230     chain->SetBranchAddress("smearEle", smearEle_);
00231   }
00232 
00233   if(chain->GetBranch("r9Weight")!=NULL){
00234     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy correction branch from friend" << std::endl;
00235     chain->SetBranchAddress("r9Weight", r9weight_);
00236   } 
00237 
00238   //chain->Show(entryList->GetEntry(0));
00239   RooDataSet *data = new RooDataSet(chain->GetTitle(),"dataset",Vars);
00240   //  entryList->Print("all");
00241   Long64_t entries = entryList->GetN();
00242   //chain->LoadTree(0);
00243   //chain->GetEntry(0);
00244   std::cout << "___ ENTRIES: " << entries << std::endl;
00245   for(Long64_t jentry=0; jentry < entries; jentry++){
00246     //Int_t treenum=0;
00247     //Long64_t treeEntry = entryList->GetEntryAndTree(jentry,treenum);
00248     //Long64_t chainEntry = treeEntry+chain->GetTreeOffset()[treenum];  
00249     //chain->LoadTree(chainEntry); // this also returns treeEntry
00250     //    chain->GetEntry(chainEntry);
00251     chain->GetEntry(chain->GetEntryNumber(jentry));
00252 //     Long64_t ientry = entryList->GetEntry(jentry);
00253 //     //std::cerr << "ientry = " << ientry << std::endl;
00254 //     if(chain->LoadTree(ientry)<=0) exit(1);
00255 //     if(chain->GetEntry(ientry)<=0) exit(1);
00256 //     if( != ientry) exit(1);
00257     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] PU: " << pileupWeight_ 
00258                             << std::endl;
00259     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] corrEle[0]: " << corrEle_[0] << std::endl;
00260     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] corrEle[1]: " << corrEle_[1] << std::endl;
00261 
00262     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] smearEle[0]: " << smearEle_[0] << std::endl;
00263     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] smearEle[1]: " << smearEle_[1] << std::endl;
00264 
00265     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] r9weight[0]: " << r9weight_[0] << std::endl;    
00266     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] r9weight[1]: " << r9weight_[1] << std::endl;
00267 
00268     invMass_*=sqrt(corrEle_[0] * corrEle_[1] *(smearEle_[0]) * (smearEle_[1]));
00269     invMass.setVal(invMass_ );
00270     weight.setVal(weight_*pileupWeight_ * r9weight_[0]*r9weight_[1]); 
00271     if(invMass_ > invMass.getMin() && invMass_ < invMass.getMax()) data->add(Vars);
00272   }
00273   data->Print();
00274   chain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00275   return data;
00276 }
00277 
00278 RooDataSet *ZFit_class::TreeToRooDataSet(TChain *chain, TCut cut){
00279   
00280 
00281   Float_t invMass_;
00282 
00283   Float_t weight_; weight_=1;
00284   Float_t r9weight_[2]={1,1}; //r9weight_[0]=1; r9weight_[1]=1;
00285   Float_t pileupWeight_=1;
00286 
00287   Float_t corrEle_[2]={1,1}; //corrEle_[0]=1; corrEle_[1]=1;
00288   Float_t smearEle_[2]={1,1}; //corrEle_[0]=1; corrEle_[1]=1;
00289 
00290   chain->SetBranchAddress(invMass.GetName(), &invMass_);
00291 
00292   if(chain->GetBranch("puWeight")!=NULL){
00293     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding pileup weight branch from friend" << std::endl;
00294     chain->SetBranchAddress("puWeight", &pileupWeight_);
00295   } 
00296 
00297   if(chain->GetBranch("scaleEle")!=NULL){
00298     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy correction branch from friend" << std::endl;
00299     chain->SetBranchAddress("scaleEle", corrEle_);
00300   }
00301 
00302   if(chain->GetBranch("smearEle")!=NULL && TString(chain->GetTitle())!="d"){
00303     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy smearing branch from friend" << std::endl;
00304     //chain->Scan("smearEle");
00305     chain->SetBranchAddress("smearEle", smearEle_);
00306   }
00307 
00308   if(chain->GetBranch("r9Weight")!=NULL){
00309     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy correction branch from friend" << std::endl;
00310     chain->SetBranchAddress("r9Weight", r9weight_);
00311   } 
00312 
00313   RooDataSet *data = new RooDataSet(chain->GetTitle(),"dataset",Vars);
00314 
00315   Long64_t entries = chain->GetEntryList()->GetN();
00316   chain->LoadTree(chain->GetEntryNumber(0));
00317   Long64_t treenumber=-1;
00318   TTreeFormula *selector = new TTreeFormula("selector", cut, chain);
00319 
00320   std::cout << "___ ENTRIES: " << entries << std::endl;
00321   for(Long64_t jentry=0; jentry < entries; jentry++){
00322     Long64_t entryNumber= chain->GetEntryNumber(jentry);
00323     chain->GetEntry(entryNumber);
00324     if (chain->GetTreeNumber() != treenumber) {
00325       treenumber = chain->GetTreeNumber();
00326       selector->UpdateFormulaLeaves();
00327     }
00328     if(selector->EvalInstance()==false) continue;
00329 
00330     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] PU: " << pileupWeight_ 
00331                             << std::endl;
00332     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] corrEle[0]: " << corrEle_[0] << std::endl;
00333     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] corrEle[1]: " << corrEle_[1] << std::endl;
00334 
00335     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] smearEle[0]: " << smearEle_[0] << std::endl;
00336     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] smearEle[1]: " << smearEle_[1] << std::endl;
00337 
00338     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] r9weight[0]: " << r9weight_[0] << std::endl;    
00339     if(jentry<1)  std::cout << "[DEBUG] r9weight[1]: " << r9weight_[1] << std::endl;
00340 
00341     invMass_*=sqrt(corrEle_[0] * corrEle_[1] *(smearEle_[0]) * (smearEle_[1]));
00342     invMass.setVal(invMass_ );
00343     weight.setVal(weight_*pileupWeight_ * r9weight_[0]*r9weight_[1]); 
00344     if(invMass_ > invMass.getMin() && invMass_ < invMass.getMax()) data->add(Vars);
00345   }
00346   delete selector;
00347   data->Print();
00348   chain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00349 
00350   return data;
00351 }
00352 
00353 RooAbsData *ZFit_class::ReduceDataset(TChain *data, TString region, bool isMC, bool isUnbinned){
00354 
00355   std::cout << "------------------------------ REDUCE DATASETS: region = " << region << std::endl;
00356   if(region.Sizeof()>1)  std::cout << " - reducing " << data->GetName() << " dataset to " << region 
00357                                    << std::endl;
00358   else std::cout << " - removing trakerDriven electrons" << std::endl;
00359 
00360   // reduce the tree to the selected events
00361   
00362   //std::cout << cutter.GetCut(region,isMC) << std::endl;
00363   TStopwatch myClock;
00364   myClock.Start();
00365   RooAbsData *reduced = TreeToRooDataSet(data, cutter.GetCut(region,isMC)); 
00366   myClock.Stop();
00367   if(!isUnbinned){ //if not an unbinned fit, transform the roodataset in histogram
00368     std::cout << "[INFO] Binned fit" << std::endl;
00369 #ifdef DEBUG
00370     std::cout << "[DEBUG] Binned reduced dataset: nBins = " << invMass.getBins("plotRange") << "\tbin_min = " << invMass.getMin() << std::endl;    
00371 #endif
00372     TH1F histogram("dataset_his","dataset_his", invMass.getBins("plotRange"), invMass.getMin(), invMass.getMax());
00373     
00374     histogram.Sumw2();
00375     Long64_t nevent= reduced->numEntries() ;
00376     for(Long64_t i=0; i < nevent; ++i) 
00377       {
00378         const RooArgSet* data= reduced->get(i);
00379         float invMass_val= ((const RooRealVar*) (data->find(invMass.GetName())))->getVal();
00380         float weight_val=((const RooRealVar*) (data->find(weight.GetName())))->getVal();
00381         histogram.Fill(invMass_val,weight_val); 
00382 #ifdef DEBUG
00383         if(i<1) std::cout << "invMass_val= " << invMass_val << "\t" << "weight_val= "<< weight_val << "\t" << "sumW2="<<histogram.GetSumOfWeights()  << std::endl;
00384 #endif
00385       }
00386 #ifdef DEBUG
00387     std::cout << "bin 20 content= " << histogram.GetBinContent(20) << "\t" << "error= "<< histogram.GetBinError(20) << std::endl;
00388 #endif
00389 
00390     delete reduced; // unbinned reduced no more useful
00391     RooDataHist *dataset_hist = new RooDataHist("roodataset_hist","roodataset_hist", invMass, &histogram);
00392     reduced = dataset_hist;
00393   } else {
00394     std::cout << "[INFO] Unbinned fit" << std::endl;
00395   }
00396   reduced->Print();
00397 
00398   std::cout << "------------------------------" << std::endl;
00399   
00400   
00401   return reduced;
00402   
00403 }

00405 
00406 void ZFit_class::SetPDF_signal(int pdf_index){
00407 
00408   signal_pdf_type=pdf_index;
00409   // va fatta la scelta tra cruijff e convolution
00410   switch(pdf_index){
00411   case 0:
00412     std::cout << "[SETTING SIGNAL PDF]: BW and CB convolution" << std::endl;
00413     signal_pdf = &(convBwCbPdf.GetPdf());
00414     params = (convBwCbPdf.GetParams());
00415     break;
00416   case 1:
00417     std::cout << "[SETTING SIGNAL PDF]: Cruijff pdf" << std::endl;
00418     signal_pdf = &(cruijffPdf.GetPdf());
00419     params = (cruijffPdf.GetParams());
00420     break;
00421   default:
00422     std::cerr << "[WARNING] signal pdf index not defined, using default" << std::endl;
00423     std::cout << "[SETTING SIGNAL PDF]: BW and CB convolution" << std::endl;
00424     signal_pdf = &(convBwCbPdf.GetPdf());
00425     params = (convBwCbPdf.GetParams());
00426     break;
00427   }
00428 
00429   return;
00430 }
00431 
00432 void ZFit_class::SetPDF_model(int signal_pdf_index, int bkg_pdf_index){
00433 
00434   SetPDF_signal(signal_pdf_index);
00435 
00436 
00437   // to be put in a separate method setting only the bkg pdf
00438   bkg_pdf_type=bkg_pdf_index;
00439 
00440   if(bkg_pdf_index==0){
00441     // we use only signal hypothesis
00442     std::cout << "[SETTING] model = only signal" << std::endl;
00443     model_pdf = signal_pdf;
00444   } else {
00445     std::cerr << "[WARNING] pdf model not defined!!!! Still to be implemented" << std::endl;
00446     std::cerr << "          Using only signal hypothesis instead" << std::endl;
00447     model_pdf = signal_pdf;
00448   }
00449   return;
00450 }

00452 
00458 void ZFit_class::SetFitPar(RooFitResult *fitres_MC){
00459 
00460   if(fitres_MC != NULL){
00461     switch(signal_pdf_type){ // this is not elegant....
00462     case 0:
00463       convBwCbPdf.SetFitType(_fit_type);
00464     case 1:
00465       cruijffPdf.SetFitType(_fit_type);
00466     }
00467 
00468     RooArgList argList = fitres_MC->floatParsFinal();
00469     for(int i=0; i<argList.getSize(); i++){ // copy fitresults to 
00470       RooRealVar *listVar = (RooRealVar *) &argList[i];
00471       RooRealVar *var;
00472       var =  (RooRealVar *)  &((*params)[listVar->GetName()]);
00473       var->setVal(listVar->getVal()); // unuseful the pdf is the same, it has the previous value by default
00474     }
00475   }
00476   else{
00477     switch(signal_pdf_type){ // this is not elegant....
00478     case 0:
00479       convBwCbPdf.SetFitType(0);
00480       convBwCbPdf.InitFitValues();      
00481     case 1:
00482       cruijffPdf.SetFitType(0);
00483       cruijffPdf.InitFitValues();      
00484     }
00485   }
00486    
00487   return;
00488 }
00489 
00490 
00491 void ZFit_class::Fit(TH1F *hist, bool isMC){
00492   RooAbsData *data_red=NULL;
00493 
00494   data_red=ImportHist(hist);
00495 
00496   //  SetFitPar();
00497 
00498   //RooFitResult *fitres = 
00499     model_pdf->fitTo(*data_red,RooFit::Save(), //RooFit::Range(range.c_str()), 
00500                                           RooFit::NumCPU(1),
00501 #ifdef FIT_DEBUG
00502                                           RooFit::Verbose(kTRUE),RooFit::PrintLevel(3),
00503                                           RooFit::Warnings(kTRUE),RooFit::PrintEvalErrors(kTRUE),
00504 #else
00505                                           RooFit::Verbose(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintLevel(-1),
00506                                           RooFit::Warnings(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintEvalErrors(kFALSE),
00507 #endif
00508                                           RooFit::SumW2Error(kTRUE)
00509                                           );
00510 
00511 #ifdef DEBUG
00512     //fitres -> Print();
00513 #endif
00514 
00515   // si puo' fare in moodo piu' intelligente?
00516   // mettere il retrieve della larghezza e dello shift del picco dipendente dal tipo di pdf segnale  
00517 
00518   std::pair<double,double> deltaM;
00519   std::pair<double,double> width;
00520 
00521   switch(signal_pdf_type){
00522   case 0:
00523     deltaM = convBwCbPdf.GetDeltaM();
00524     width  = convBwCbPdf.GetWidth();
00525     break;
00526   case 1:
00527     deltaM = cruijffPdf.GetDeltaM();
00528     width  = cruijffPdf.GetWidth();
00529     break;
00530   }
00531 
00532 #ifdef DEBUG
00533   std::cout << "deltaM = " << deltaM.first << " \\pm " << deltaM.second << std::endl;
00534   std::cout << "width = "  << width.first  << " \\pm " << width.second  << std::endl;
00535 #endif
00536 
00537   if(isMC){
00538     deltaM_MC_map.push_back(deltaM);
00539     width_MC_map.push_back(width);
00540   } else {
00541     deltaM_data_map.push_back(deltaM);
00542     width_data_map.push_back(width);
00543   }
00544 
00545 
00546 
00547   PlotFit(data_red, isMC);
00548   return;
00549 }
00550 
00551 
00552 RooFitResult *ZFit_class::FitData(TString region, bool doPlot, RooFitResult *fitres_MC){
00553   RooAbsData *data_red   = ReduceDataset(data, region, false, _isDataUnbinned);
00554   nEvents_region_data=data_red->sumEntries();
00555   if(nEvents_region_data < 100){
00556     data_red   = ReduceDataset(data, region, false, _isDataUnbinned);
00557     nEvents_region_data=data_red->sumEntries();
00558   }
00559   if(nEvents_region_data < 100) return NULL;
00560   int numcpu=4;
00561   if(_isDataUnbinned) numcpu=1;
00562   
00563   SetFitPar(fitres_MC);
00564   RooFitResult *fitres_data = model_pdf->fitTo(*data_red,RooFit::Save(), //RooFit::Range(range.c_str()), 
00565                                                RooFit::NumCPU(numcpu),
00566                                                RooFit::Verbose(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintLevel(-1),
00567                                                RooFit::Warnings(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintEvalErrors(kFALSE),
00568                                                RooFit::SumW2Error(_isDataSumW2)
00569                                                );
00570   fitres_data->Print("V");
00571   
00572   // salvo in una mappa i valori del fit // replace all this asking the Width and peak from the pdfs!!!
00573   //deltaM_data_map.push_back(convBwCbPdf.GetDeltaM(fitres_data));
00574   //width_data_map.push_back(convBwCbPdf.GetWidth(fitres_data));
00575   
00576   //make sure the params are the same as the fit result
00577   SetFitPar(fitres_data);
00578   
00579   // add the rescaled width map 
00580   
00581   if(doPlot){
00582     PlotFit(data_red,false);
00583     plot_data->Print();
00584     //chi2_data = (model_pdf->createChi2(*data_red))->getValue();
00585     chi2_data = plot_data->chiSquare();//invMass.getBins("plotRange")-fitres_data->floatParsFinal().getSize());
00586   }
00587   delete data_red;
00588   return fitres_data;
00589 }
00590 
00591 RooFitResult *ZFit_class::FitMC(TString region, bool doPlot){
00592   RooAbsData *signal_red = ReduceDataset(signal, region, true, _isMCUnbinned);
00593   nEvents_region_MC = signal_red->sumEntries();
00594   if( nEvents_region_MC < 30) return NULL;
00595   int numcpu=4;
00596   if(!_isMCUnbinned) numcpu=2; // would prefer 1, but bug in RooFit: wrong error estimation for weighted datahist if 1 cpu
00597 
00598   SetFitPar();
00599   RooFitResult *fitres_MC = model_pdf->fitTo(*signal_red,RooFit::Save(), //RooFit::Range(range.c_str()), 
00600                                              RooFit::NumCPU(numcpu),
00601                                              RooFit::Verbose(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintLevel(-1),
00602                                              RooFit::Warnings(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintEvalErrors(kFALSE),
00603                                              RooFit::SumW2Error(_isMCSumW2)
00604                                              );
00605 
00606   fitres_MC->Print("V");
00607 
00608   // salvo in una mappa i valori del fit
00609 
00610   //deltaM_MC_map.push_back(convBwCbPdf.GetDeltaM(fitres_MC));
00611   //  width_MC_map.push_back(convBwCbPdf.GetWidth(fitres_MC));
00612 
00613   //make sure the params are the same as the fit result
00614   SetFitPar(fitres_MC);
00615 
00616 
00617   if(doPlot){
00618     PlotFit(signal_red,true);
00619     chi2_MC = plot_MC->chiSquare(invMass.getBins("plotRange")-fitres_MC->floatParsFinal().getSize());
00620   }
00621   
00622   delete signal_red; // delete the reduced dataset
00623 
00624   return fitres_MC;
00625 }
00626 
00627 
00628 
00629 void ZFit_class::Fit(TString region, bool doPlot){
00630 
00631   std::cout << "============================== ";
00632   std::cout << "[STATUS] Fitting region: " << region << std::endl;
00633   RooFitResult *fitres_MC=NULL;
00634 
00635   // for the MC skip the runNumber
00636   TString regionMC=region; 
00637   int p = regionMC.Index("-runNumber");
00638   int pp = regionMC.Index("-", p+1);
00639   
00640   if(p>0){ //there is the runNumber string
00641     TString region_tmp=region;
00642     region_tmp.Remove(0,p);   // remove the part before
00643     if(pp>0) region_tmp.Remove(pp-p); // remove the part after if exists
00644     region_tmp.ReplaceAll("-runNumber_",""); // remove runNumber string
00645     TString region_tmp2=region_tmp;
00646     region_tmp.Remove(region_tmp.First('_')); // take the runMin 
00647     region_tmp2.Remove(0,region_tmp2.First('_')+1); //take the runMax
00648     int runMin=region_tmp.Atoi();
00649     int runMax=region_tmp2.Atoi();
00650     std::cout << region << "\t" << p << " " << pp << "\ttmp " << region_tmp << "\ttmp2 " << region_tmp2 << "\trunMin " << runMin << "\t" << runMax << std::endl;
00651     if(pp<=0) regionMC.Remove(p);
00652     else regionMC.Remove(p,pp-p);
00653     // cuts for runDependentMC!
00654     if(runMin>=190456 && runMax<=196531) regionMC.Insert(p,"-runNumber_194533_194533");
00655     if(runMin>=198111 && runMax<=203742) regionMC.Insert(p,"-runNumber_200519_200519");
00656     if(runMin>=203756 && runMax<=208686) regionMC.Insert(p,"-runNumber_206859_206859");
00657   }
00658     
00659   TString paramsMCFileName=outDirFitResMC+"/"+regionMC+".txt";
00660   TString fitResMCFileName=outDirFitResMC+"/"+regionMC+".root";
00661   TString plotMCFileName=outDirImgMC+"/"+regionMC+"."+imgFormat;  
00662 
00663   TString paramsDataFileName=outDirFitResData+"/"+region+".txt";
00664   TString fitResDataFileName=outDirFitResData+"/"+region+".root";
00665   TString plotDataFileName=outDirImgData+"/"+region+"."+imgFormat;
00666 
00667   bool newFitMC=false;
00668   if(_forceNewFit || gSystem->AccessPathName(fitResMCFileName)){ // if the file does not exist 
00669     newFitMC=true;
00670     fitres_MC = FitMC(regionMC, doPlot);
00671     if(fitres_MC !=NULL){
00672       fitres_MC->SetName("MC");
00673       SaveFitRes(fitres_MC,fitResMCFileName, chi2_MC, nEvents_region_MC); //
00674       params->writeToFile(paramsMCFileName);            
00675       if(doPlot) SaveFitPlot(plotMCFileName,true);
00676     }else{
00677       std::cerr << "[WARNING] MC fit for region: " << region << " not possible because nEvents < 100" << std::endl;
00678       std::cout << "[WARNING] MC fit for region: " << region << " not possible because nEvents < 100" << std::endl;
00679       return;
00680     }      
00681   } else {
00682     newFitMC=false;
00683     // take the fit result from the file
00684     std::cout << "[INFO] Fit results for MC taken from file:" << fitResMCFileName << std::endl;
00685     TFile fitResMCFile(fitResMCFileName,"OPEN");
00686     fitres_MC = (RooFitResult *) ((RooFitResult *)fitResMCFile.Get("MC"))->Clone("MC_fitres");
00687     fitResMCFile.Close();
00688     fitres_MC->Print();
00689 
00690   }
00691 
00692 
00693   if(_updateOnly==false || newFitMC || gSystem->AccessPathName(fitResDataFileName)){
00694     RooFitResult *fitres_data = FitData(region, doPlot, fitres_MC);
00695     if(fitres_data!=NULL){
00696       fitres_data->SetName("data");
00697       params->writeToFile(paramsDataFileName);          
00698       SaveFitRes(fitres_data,fitResDataFileName, chi2_data, nEvents_region_data); // isMC=false
00699       if(doPlot) SaveFitPlot(plotDataFileName,false);
00700       delete fitres_data;
00701     }else {
00702       if(nEvents_region_data < 100){
00703         std::cerr << "[WARNING] Data fit for region: " << region << " not possible because nEvents < 100" << std::endl;
00704         std::cout << "[WARNING] Data fit for region: " << region << " not possible because nEvents < 100" << std::endl;
00705       } else {
00706         std::cerr << "[WARNING] Data fit for region: " << region << " not possible" << std::endl;
00707         std::cout << "[WARNING] Data fit for region: " << region << " not possible" << std::endl;
00708       }
00709     }
00710   }
00711 
00712   //devo salvare i risultati deltaM e width
00713 
00714 
00715   delete fitres_MC;
00716   return;
00717 
00718 }
00719 
00720 
00721 void ZFit_class::FitToy(TString region, int nToys, int nEvents, bool doPlot){
00722   RooMsgService::instance().setGlobalKillBelow(RooFit::WARNING) ;
00723   std::cout << "============================== ";
00724   std::cout << "[STATUS] Toy Fitting region: " << region << std::endl;
00725   
00726   TTree* toytree = InitTree();
00727 
00728 
00729   BW_CB_pdf_class tempconvBwCbPdf(invMass);
00730 
00731   RooAbsPdf *generator_pdf = &(tempconvBwCbPdf.GetPdf()); //with original initial values
00732 
00733   //      cout <<"before reading"<<endl; 
00734   //      (tempconvBwCbPdf.params).Print("v");
00735 
00736   //      cout <<"name of init file: "<<_initFileNameMC<<endl; 
00737   (tempconvBwCbPdf.params).readFromFile(_initFileNameMC,0,0,kTRUE);
00738   //      (convBwCbPdf.params).Print("v");
00739 
00740   params = tempconvBwCbPdf.GetParams();
00741   //  cout <<" before set init: gamma"<<((RooRealVar *)params->find("\\gamma"))->getVal()<<endl;
00742   //cout <<" before set init: dm "<<((RooRealVar *)params->find("\\Delta m"))->getVal()<<endl;
00743 
00744 
00745           
00746   SetInitParamsfromRead(params);
00747 
00748   RooAbsPdf* fit_pdf = &(convBwCbPdf.GetPdf()); //generator pdf
00749 
00750   /*RooPlot* plot = invMass.frame();
00751     fit_pdf->plotOn(plot, RooFit::LineColor(kRed));
00752     fit_pdf->paramOn(plot);
00753     generator_pdf->plotOn(plot, RooFit::LineColor(kBlue));
00754     generator_pdf->paramOn(plot);
00755     TCanvas c("canvas","");
00756     c.cd();
00757     plot->Draw();
00758     c.SaveAs("toy/pdf_"+region+".png");
00759   */
00760   TFile* f = new TFile("toy/"+region+"_toy.root","RECREATE");
00761 
00762   if (_isToyUnbinned){
00763     int numcpu=4;
00764     for (int i = 0; i < nToys; ++i){
00765       RooDataSet* toydata = generator_pdf->generate(invMass, nEvents);         
00766       SetFitPar();
00767       RooFitResult *fitres_Toy = fit_pdf->fitTo(*toydata,RooFit::Save(), //RooFit::Range(range.c_str()), 
00768                                                 RooFit::NumCPU(numcpu),
00769                                                 RooFit::Verbose(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintLevel(-1),
00770                                                 RooFit::Warnings(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintEvalErrors(kFALSE),
00771                                                 RooFit::SumW2Error(_isToySumW2)
00772                                                 );
00773       toy_deltaM = ((RooRealVar *) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\Delta m"))->getVal();
00774       toy_width = ((RooRealVar *) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\sigma_{CB}"))->getVal();
00775       toy_gamma =  ((RooRealVar *) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\gamma"))->getVal();
00776       toy_alpha = ((RooRealVar*) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\alpha"))->getVal();
00777       toytree->Fill();
00778       //                delete toydata;
00779       //                delete fitres_Toy;        
00780     }
00781   }
00782   else {
00783     std::cout<<"Using binned for toy MC generator"<<std::endl;
00784     int numcpu=2;
00785     for (int i = 0; i < nToys; ++i){
00786       RooDataHist* toydata = generator_pdf->generateBinned(invMass, nEvents);         
00787       SetFitPar();
00788 
00789       //std::cout <<"init gamma: "<<init_gamma<<std::endl;
00790       RooFitResult *fitres_Toy = fit_pdf->fitTo(*toydata,RooFit::Save(), //RooFit::Range(range.c_str()), 
00791                                                 RooFit::NumCPU(numcpu),
00792                                                 RooFit::Verbose(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintLevel(-1),
00793                                                 RooFit::Warnings(kFALSE),RooFit::PrintEvalErrors(kFALSE),
00794                                                 RooFit::SumW2Error(_isToySumW2),
00795                                                 RooFit::PrintLevel(-1)
00796                                                 );
00797       //[XH]
00798       //cout <<"[XH] iToys "<<i<<endl;
00799       //fitres_Toy->Print("V");
00800       //cout <<"[XH] fit result status: "<<fitres_Toy->status()<<endl;
00801       toy_deltaM = ((RooRealVar *) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\Delta m"))->getVal();
00802       toy_width = ((RooRealVar *) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\sigma_{CB}"))->getVal();
00803       toy_gamma =  ((RooRealVar *) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\gamma"))->getVal();
00804       toy_alpha = ((RooRealVar*) (fitres_Toy->floatParsFinal()).find("\\alpha"))->getVal();
00805       //          cout <<"gamma: "<<toy_gamma<<endl;
00806       toytree->Fill();
00807       //RooPlot* finalplot = invMass.frame();
00808       /*  if (nToys ==2){ 
00809           toydata->plotOn(finalplot, RooFit::DrawOption("B"), RooFit::FillColor(kGray));
00810           generator_pdf->plotOn(finalplot, RooFit::LineColor(kBlue));
00811           generator_pdf->paramOn(finalplot);
00812           fit_pdf->plotOn(finalplot, RooFit::LineColor(kRed));
00813           fit_pdf->paramOn(finalplot);
00814 
00815           TCanvas c1("canvas","");
00816           c1.cd();
00817           finalplot->Draw();
00818           c1.SaveAs("toy/result.png");
00819           }
00820       */
00821       //                delete toydata;
00822       //                delete fitres_Toy;        
00823     }
00824   }
00825   toytree->Write();
00826   f->Close();
00827   //delete toytree;
00828   //delete f;
00829   return;
00830 }
00831 
00832 void ZFit_class::SaveFitRes(RooFitResult *fitres, TString fileName, float chi2, double nEvents ){
00833   RooCmdArg LatexFormat(RooFit::Format("NEU",RooFit::AutoPrecision(2),RooFit::VerbatimName(kFALSE)));
00834 
00835   TFile fitResFile(fileName,"RECREATE");
00836   fitResFile.cd();
00837   fitres->Write();
00838   fitResFile.Write();
00839   fitResFile.Close();  
00840   fitres->floatParsFinal().printLatex(LatexFormat, RooFit::OutputFile(fileName.ReplaceAll(".root",".tex")));
00841   std::ofstream f(fileName,std::ios_base::app);
00842   f << "% nEvents=" << nEvents << std::endl;
00843   f << "% chi2=" << chi2 << std::endl;
00844   f.close();
00845   return;
00846 }

00848 void ZFit_class::PrintScale(std::ostream outScale){
00849   // std::map<TString, std::pair<double,double> > deltaM_map;
00850   //          region ,          val    , err
00851 
00852   for(unsigned int i=0; i < deltaM_data_map.size(); i++){
00853     //    TString region=itr->first;
00854     //    double deltaG=(deltaM_data_map[region].first - deltaM_MC_map[region].first)/mRes.getVal() * 100;
00855     //    double deltaG_err = (deltaM_data_map[region].second*deltaM_data_map[region].second + 
00856     //                   deltaM_MC_map[region].first*deltaM_MC_map[region].first)/mRes.getVal() * 100;
00857     outScale << region_map[i] << "\t" 
00858              << deltaM_data_map[i].first << "\t" << deltaM_data_map[i].second << "\t"
00859              << deltaM_MC_map[i].first << "\t" << deltaM_MC_map[i].second << "\t"
00860       //     << deltaG  << "\t" << deltaG_err << "\t"
00861              << std::endl;
00862 
00863   }
00864   return;
00865 }

00893 
00894 void ZFit_class::PlotFit(RooAbsData *data_red, bool isMC){
00895 
00896   if(isMC){
00897     if(plot_MC!=NULL) delete plot_MC;
00898     plot_MC = invMass.frame(//RooFit::Range(invMass_min,invMass_max),
00899                             RooFit::Title(""), 
00900                             RooFit::Name("MC_plot"));
00901 
00902     data_red->plotOn(plot_MC, 
00903                      RooFit::DrawOption("B"), 
00904                      RooFit::DataError(RooAbsData::SumW2), // RooFit::DataError(RooAbsData::None),
00905                      RooFit::XErrorSize(0), //RooFit::YErrorSize(0)
00906                      RooFit::FillColor(kGray),
00907                      RooFit::Binning("plotRange"));
00908     model_pdf->plotOn(plot_MC,RooFit::LineColor(kRed));
00909     model_pdf->paramOn(plot_MC,RooFit::Layout(0.62,0.98,0.9));
00910     TAttText *text_MC = plot_MC->getAttText();
00911     text_MC->SetTextSize(0.03);
00912     plot_MC->SetTitleOffset(0.9,"y");
00913   }else{
00914     if(plot_data!=NULL) delete plot_data;
00915     plot_data = invMass.frame(//RooFit::Range(invMass_min,invMass_max),
00916                               RooFit::Title(""), 
00917                               RooFit::Name("data_plot"));
00918 
00919     data_red->plotOn(plot_data, RooFit::Binning("plotRange"));
00920     model_pdf->plotOn(plot_data, RooFit::LineColor(kBlue));
00921     //  model_pdf->plotOn(plot_data, RooFit::LineColor(kRed), RooFit::Components(bkg),RooFit::LineStyle(kDashed));
00922     model_pdf->paramOn(plot_data,RooFit::Layout(0.62,0.98,0.9));
00923     TAttText *text_data = plot_data->getAttText();
00924     text_data->SetTextSize(0.03);
00925   }
00926 
00927   return;
00928 }
00929 
00930 void ZFit_class::PlotFit(RooAbsData *signal_red, RooAbsData *data_red){ 
00931   //  SetTDRStyle();
00932   if(plot_MC!=NULL) delete plot_MC;
00933   if(plot_data!=NULL) delete plot_data;
00934 
00935   plot_MC = invMass.frame(//RooFit::Range(invMass_min,invMass_max),
00936                           //RooFit::Title("MC"), 
00937                           RooFit::Name("MC_plot"));
00938 
00939   plot_data = invMass.frame(//RooFit::Range(invMass_min,invMass_max),
00940                             // RooFit::Title("Data"), 
00941                             RooFit::Name("data_plot"));//(data_plot->GetName()+plot_name).c_str()));
00942 
00943   // plot del MC
00944   signal_red->plotOn(plot_MC, 
00945                      RooFit::DrawOption("B"), 
00946                      RooFit::DataError(RooAbsData::None),
00947                      RooFit::XErrorSize(0), //RooFit::YErrorSize(0)
00948                      RooFit::FillColor(kGray),
00949                      RooFit::Binning("plotRange"));
00950   model_pdf->plotOn(plot_MC,RooFit::LineColor(kRed));
00951   model_pdf->paramOn(plot_MC,RooFit::Layout(0.62,0.98,0.9));
00952   TAttText *text_MC = plot_MC->getAttText();
00953   text_MC->SetTextSize(0.03);
00954   plot_MC->SetTitleOffset(0.9,"y");
00955 
00956   // plot dei dati
00957   data_red->plotOn(plot_data, RooFit::Binning("plotRange"));
00958   model_pdf->plotOn(plot_data, RooFit::LineColor(kBlue));
00959   //  model_pdf->plotOn(plot_data, RooFit::LineColor(kRed), RooFit::Components(bkg),RooFit::LineStyle(kDashed));
00960   model_pdf->paramOn(plot_data,RooFit::Layout(0.62,0.98,0.9));
00961   TAttText *text_data = plot_data->getAttText();
00962   text_data->SetTextSize(0.03);
00963 
00964   return;
00965 }
00966 
00967 void ZFit_class::SaveFitPlot(TString fileName, bool isMC){
00968 
00969 
00970   //  if(region.Sizeof() <=1) region="all";
00971   TString canvasName= isMC ? "c_MC" : "c_data";
00972   TCanvas c(canvasName,"");
00973 
00974   c.cd();
00975   if(isMC) plot_MC->Draw();
00976   else plot_data->Draw();
00977   c.SaveAs(fileName);
00978   c.SaveAs(fileName.ReplaceAll(imgFormat,"C"));
00979 
00980   return;
00981 }

00983 // modificare per avere in return un pair con valore e errore
00984 double ZFit_class::GetLastDeltaM(bool isMC){
00985   if(isMC) return deltaM_MC_map.back().first;
00986   else return deltaM_data_map.back().first;
00987 }
00988 
00989 double ZFit_class::GetLastWidth(bool isMC){
00990   if(isMC) return width_MC_map.back().first;
00991   else return width_data_map.back().first;
00992 }

00994 
00995 
00996 #ifdef shervin
00997 void ZFit_class::PlotInvMass(TString region){
00998 
00999 #ifdef DEBUG
01000   std::cout << "------------------------------ Plotting invariant mass histograms" << std::endl;
01001 #endif
01002 
01003   double nMC=0;//, nDATA=0;
01004   //  TString region="EB";
01005   THStack stack("stack","");
01006   TLegend legend(0.8, 0.8, 1, 1, "", "NDC");
01007   legend.SetFillColor(0);
01008   legend.SetBorderSize(1);
01009 
01010   /* creo la mappa con gli istogrammi per ogni voce di legenda 
01011    * std::map< legend, TH1F *>
01012    */
01013 
01014   std::cout << "--------------- Plotting data" << std::endl;
01015   TH1F *data_hist=NULL;
01016   hist_map_t data_hist_map = MakeHistMap(data_chain_map, region);
01017   if(data_hist_map.empty()) return;
01018 
01019   std::cout << "--------------- Plotting signal" << std::endl;
01020   hist_map_t signal_hist_map = MakeHistMap(signal_chain_map, region);
01021   if(signal_hist_map.empty()) return;
01022 
01023   std::cout << "--------------- Plotting bkg chain" << std::endl;
01024   hist_map_t bkg_hist_map = MakeHistMap(bkg_chain_map, region);
01025   if(bkg_hist_map.empty()) return;
01026 
01027 
01028   // ciclo per avere il numero di eventi MC e dati
01029   for(hist_map_t::const_iterator hist_itr=bkg_hist_map.begin();
01030       hist_itr!=bkg_hist_map.end();
01031       hist_itr++){
01032     // conto il numero di eventi MC del fondo
01033 #ifdef DEBUG
01034     std::cout << hist_itr->first << "\t" << hist_itr->second->Integral() << std::endl;
01035 #endif
01036     nMC+=hist_itr->second->Integral();
01037   }
01038 
01039 
01040   for(hist_map_t::const_iterator hist_itr=signal_hist_map.begin();
01041       hist_itr!=signal_hist_map.end();
01042       hist_itr++){
01043     // conto il numero di eventi MC del fondo
01044 #ifdef DEBUG
01045     std::cout << hist_itr->first << "\t" << hist_itr->second->Integral() << std::endl;
01046 #endif
01047     nMC+=hist_itr->second->Integral();
01048 
01049   }
01050 
01051 
01052 
01053   for(hist_map_t::const_iterator hist_itr=data_hist_map.begin();
01054       hist_itr!=data_hist_map.end();
01055       hist_itr++){
01056     // conto il numero di eventi MC del fondo
01057 #ifdef DEBUG
01058     std::cout << hist_itr->first << "\t" << hist_itr->second->Integral() << std::endl;
01059 #endif
01060     // aggiungo la voce alla legenda
01061     //legend.AddEntry(hist_itr->second, hist_itr->first, "p");
01062     data_hist=hist_itr->second;
01063   }
01064 
01065 #ifdef DEBUG
01066   std::cout << "nMC = " << nMC << std::endl;
01067 #endif
01068 
01069 
01070   for(hist_map_t::const_iterator hist_itr=bkg_hist_map.begin();
01071       hist_itr!=bkg_hist_map.end();
01072       hist_itr++){
01073     hist_itr->second->Scale(data_hist->Integral()/nMC);
01074     // aggiungo la voce alla legenda
01075     legend.AddEntry(hist_itr->second, hist_itr->first, "F");
01076 
01077     hist_itr->second->SetFillColor(3);
01078     // aggiungo l'istogramma allo stack
01079     stack.Add(hist_itr->second);
01080   }
01081 
01082 
01083 
01084   TString xLabel="M_{ee} GeV/c^{2}";
01085   TString yLabel="Events/ ";
01086   yLabel+=invMass.getBinning("plotRange").binWidth(1);
01087   yLabel+="GeV/c^{2}";
01088 
01089   TCanvas c("c","c");
01090   stack.Draw();
01091   stack.GetXaxis()->SetTitle(xLabel);
01092   stack.GetYaxis()->SetTitle(yLabel);
01093   legend.Draw();
01094 
01095   data_hist->SetMarkerSize(1);
01096   data_hist->SetMarkerStyle(20);
01097   data_hist->Draw("pesame");
01098 
01099   c.SaveAs(GetDir()+"/invMass/"+region+"_linear.eps");
01100   c.SaveAs(GetDir()+"/invMass/"+region+"_linear.C");
01101   c.SetLogy();
01102   c.SaveAs(GetDir()+"/invMass/"+region+"_log.eps");
01103   c.SaveAs(GetDir()+"/invMass/"+region+"_log.C");
01104   //creo un istogramma per ogni voce di legenda
01105   // devo prendere quindi la lista delle voci di legenda
01106   // normalizzo l'istogramma ad 1 pb-1 (automatico con il weight della chain)
01107   // costruisco lo stack
01108   // 165133
01109   return;
01110 }
01111 
01112 #endif
01113 
01114 
01115 
01116 
01117 
01118 float ZFit_class::GetRescaledWidthError(float width, float width_error, float peakShift, float peakShiftError){
01119 
01120   float b=(91.187+peakShift); 
01121   float b2=b*b;
01122 
01123 
01124   return 100/b*sqrt(width_error*width_error+width*width*peakShiftError*peakShiftError/b2);
01125   // in %
01126 }

01130 //implement method for getting the corresponding energy name from invMass_name
01131 TString ZFit_class::GetEnergyVarName(TString invMass_name){
01132   TString energyBranchName="";
01133   TString invMass_var=invMass_name;
01134   if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorr_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorr_ele";
01135   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorr_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorr_pho";
01136   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_regrCorr_fra") energyBranchName = "energyEle_regrCorr_fra";
01137   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_regrCorr_egamma") energyBranchName = "energyEle_regrCorr_egamma";
01138   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC") energyBranchName = "energySCEle";
01139   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_corr") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_corr";
01140   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV4_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV4_ele";
01141   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV4_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV4_pho";
01142   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV5_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV5_ele";
01143   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV5_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV5_pho";
01144   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV6_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV6_ele";
01145   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV6_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV6_pho";
01146   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV7_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV7_ele";
01147   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV7_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV7_pho";
01148   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV8_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV8_ele";
01149   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiParV8_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV8_pho";
01150   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV6_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV6_ele";
01151   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV6_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV6_pho";
01152   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV7_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV7_ele";
01153   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV7_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV7_pho";
01154   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV8_ele") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV8_ele";
01155   else if(invMass_var=="invMass_SC_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV8_pho") energyBranchName = "energySCEle_regrCorrSemiPar7TeVtrainV8_pho";
01156   return energyBranchName;
01157 }

01159 
01160 
01161 TTree* ZFit_class::InitTree(){
01162   TTree* tree = new TTree("toy", "tree");
01163   tree->Branch("deltaM_fit", &toy_deltaM, "toy_deltaM/F");
01164   tree->Branch("width_fit", &toy_width, "toy_width/F");
01165   tree->Branch("gamma_fit", &toy_gamma, "toy_gamma/F");
01166   tree->Branch("alpha_fit", &toy_alpha, "toy_alpha/F");
01167   tree->Branch("deltaM_init", &init_deltaM, "init_deltaM/F");
01168   tree->Branch("width_init", &init_width, "init_width/F");
01169   tree->Branch("gamma_init", &init_gamma, "init_gamma/F");
01170   tree->Branch("alpha_init", &init_alpha, "init_alpha/F");
01171   return tree;
01172 }
01173 
01174 
01175 void ZFit_class::SetInitParamsfromRead(RooArgSet* pars){
01176   init_deltaM = ((RooRealVar *)params->find("\\Delta m"))->getVal();
01177   init_width = ((RooRealVar *)params->find("\\sigma_{CB}"))->getVal();
01178   init_gamma = ((RooRealVar *)params->find("\\gamma"))->getVal();
01179   //      cout <<"init gamma inside set init parms: "<<init_gamma<<endl;
01180   init_alpha = ((RooRealVar *)params->find("\\alpha"))->getVal();
01181 }
